transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji, ma'am.
Customer: Ji, sir. Aur niche aa jaiye. Hum 18th ki bhi dekh lete hain inquiry.
Executive: Abhi November chal raha hai iska.
Customer: Abhi humne dekha 21 ko bhi aayi hai, 19 ko bhi aayi hai.

Customer: 20 ko bhi aayi hai. Aur niche aa jate hain sir, dekh lete hain aur bhi date ki.
Executive: Ji.

Customer: Ab ma'am solution kya nikalna hai, woh bataiye na. Ab solution.
Customer: Sir aapne, sir solution problem to nikal jaye. Aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko direct problem hai ya nahi hai. Nahi hai to chhod dijiye baat khatam karke.
Customer: Sir ek minute. Aapne, main ek ek karke aapke point pe hi aati hu. Aapne mujhe pehle problem bataiye aapke paas direct query ek bhi nahi aati. Maine aapko points wise bataya ki aapke paas direct query aa rahi hai. Maine bataya is month mein 13 aayi hai, aap last month mein aapke paas 30 aayi. Fir aapne bataya ki jo 30 aayi woh aapki mail id pe nahi aa rahi. Fir aapne mail id kholi. Mail id pe humne teen din ki mail mails dekhi. Isme aapki 20 ki bhi inquiry dikh rahi hai, 19 ki bhi inquiry dikh rahi hai. Uske baad aapne aage scroll nahi kara to hum nahi check kar sakte. Ab aap bataiye ki aapne jo do problem mujhe batayi ki aapke paas direct query ek bhi nahi hai ya fir inquiry aapki mail pe nahi aayi hai. In dono cheezo ko to aap dekh pa rahe hain na ki hai ye cheez manageable.

Customer: Main, aap bataiye.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hamara, hamari or se koi aap issue hai ya nahi hai. Ki ye aise hi hum unhe. Sir maine, maine aapne jo issue highlight kare, jo aapne do issue bataye kya maine aapko unka solution diya ya nahi. Kya bataiye. Pehle suniye to sahi aap. Ji sir, ji sir.
Customer: Main ye bolta hu ki hamara issue hai ya nahi hai. Nahi hai to chhod dete hain baat khatam kariye. Mail ka reward aap de dijiye.
Customer: Jo do issue bataye mujhe. Abhi itna time nahi hai. Aap mujhe bataiye sir. Sir main aap hi se jaanna chah rahi hu ki aapne jo do problem mujhe bataye kya maine woh aapko dikhayi cheeze ki woh cheeze solve ho rahi hai ya nahi.
Customer: Aap, aap aapka platform pe hi dekh rahe hain ya nahi dekh rahe hain. Ki jo direct wala hai. Ye aap by list pe dekh rahe hain. Barabar hai. Sir maine to dikhaya. Sir maine bola ki ye by lead mein hai lekin aapke paas is month mein 13 hi direct query aayi hai. Main aapse ye thodi na keh rahi saari lead aapke paas direct aayi hai. 13 direct query aayi hai.


Customer: To ye pichhe to maine call kiya tha.

Customer: Haan ji.

Customer: Isme direct kaha dikhti hai mujhe. Ye. Sir isme all inquiries mein se aap by lead mein na aaye na is kar lijiye to woh direct hi bachegi.
Customer: Nahi direct. All inquiries. Direct mujhe chahiye. Direct wala inquiry se kitna aaya hai mere paas. Sir direct wala filter. Haan direct wala filter yahi hai. Par yaha pe aapki na kya ho raha hai ki kuch ek by, kuch by lead aisi hain jinhone jinhe buyer ne kabhi aapke paas kabhi direct inquiry bhi kari thi. To woh ek do by lead isliye aapko yaha pe repeat dikh ja rahi.

Customer: But yaha pe direct query hi aayengi maximum. Aap ye dekhiye maximum direct query hi hongi aapki.
Customer: Ma'am ek, ek cheez aur bataiye. Chalo maan lijiye humne mail diya. Maan lijiye galat kar diya. Haan. Ji sir. Abhi. Sir mail kar ke aapne galat kyu kara. Aapka hak hai apna apna feedback dene ka. Hum ye kaha keh rahe hain aap galat keh rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi aap maan lijiye abhi galat kiya hai. Chalo maan lijiye. Abhi mujhe ye problem ka solution ek hi chahiye. Mujhe ek hi cheez chahiye aapse. Ki mujhe inquiry aap ek week ki 34 de rahi hai. To main 34 consume kar pau. Itna mujhe satisfaction de payenge aap. Haan aap by list pe sir. Ji ma'am. Aa gaya by list pe.

Customer: Upar recent kariye. By list pe aaya ma'am. Sir sabse upar recent kariye. Recent mein. Location India wali hai.
Customer: Matlab all, all location aa gaya isme. Very good. Ab, abhi aapko yaha pe koi lead dikh rahi hai jo relevant hai.
Customer: Nahi. Sir ab aap 1 lakh ke upar ka hi dekhenge to baat hi alag hai. By by lead yaha pe sir itne saare filters ke sath to bahut limited, matlab agar aap itna selective honge to ek different scenario hai. Otherwise aap dekhiye leads ka generation hai. Ab aap right side mein dekhiye is corner mein na option aa rahe hain. Waha pe ek option aa raha hai past leads ka.
Customer: Past leads. Past leads. Right side mein sabse niche. Right side mein sabse niche dekhiye. Haan. Waha pe likha hai. Sabse niche hai. Dekhiye jaha chhote chhote icon aa rahe hain na ye help likha hua balance yahi se upar dekhiye past lead aa raha hai isi icon mein. Abhi sahi the aap sir. Jaha help likha hai na dekhiye right side mein sabse corner mein. Niche sabse corner mein. Sir scroll mat kariye page ko kuch bhi help kariye. Isi yahi sabse isi mein icon dekhiye upar past lead ka icon aa raha hai na. Click kar dijiye. Bilkul. Okay. Okay.
Customer: Ab dekhiye ye leads hain jo aapke account pe aayi hain. Aur ye expire ho gayi hain. Upar raha hu. Maan lijiye woh sold out ho gaya hai. Iska inquiry kitna tha 300 kg ka. 300 kg humne bech rahe hain. Hamara 30 tan ka kaam hai ma'am. Sir, sir inquiry aapke paas. Main samajh gayi. Main aapke paas samajh gayi. Aapke paas har quantity. 50 kg, 50 bucket. Sir, IndiaMART pe har quantity ki lead generate hoti hai jaisa buyer demand karta hai. To isliye to hum filter laga rahe hain. Aap filter mein bhi mana kar rahi hai. Aap 1 lakh pe. Sir filter laga lijiye aap above 50,000 ka filter lagaiye. Above 50,000 ka filter lagaiye aap sir. Bataiye aap. Haan ab dekhiye pehli lead do ghante pehle aayi hai. Grain granules and liquid. Ye humse, humse kyu nahi dikhayegi. Ye aapke paas bhi aayi hogi sir. Ek lead paanch, chaar se paanch log purchase karte hain. Sahi aayi hai, sahi aayi hai. Sir ye saari aapke account ki lead. Sir dekhiye. Sir ab mere ko bolne dijiye puri baat. Ek lead chaar se paanch log purchase karte hain. Agar ek second mein bhi purchase kar lenge to ek second mein lead sold out ho jayegi. To aapko har second apne system. Sir aap agar us second pe active honge to aapko lead dikhegi. Agar aap us second pe active nahi hai to lead chali jayegi. Ye, ye aa rahi hai 10 tan ki. 10 tan ka bhi hamara kaam nahi hai. Sir maine aapko ye dikha di jo IndiaMART pe leads aa rahi hain. Woh main saari aapko dikha de rahi hu. Woh saari lead jo aapke account se hokar ja rahi hai.
Customer: To matlab aap ye kehna chah rahi hai ki inquiry aa rahi hai, sab kuch sahi chal raha hai lekin aap uske account pe kaam nahi kar rahe hain. Ab main aapko dikhati hu. Main aapko dikha rahi hu kuch cheeze jo hum kar sakte hain. Ab aap dekh lijiye. Ek baar aap apni screen present karna stop kariye. Main aapko kuch categories dikha rahi hu. Ek kaam kijiye na. Mujhe kuch sunna nahi hai. Aap jo bhi hai mail mein reply kijiye baat khatam kijiye. Sir main aapke, aapke products aapse jaane bina nahi add kar sakti na. Aap, aap bataiye aap. Baat ki likhiye. Vineet ji ko maine pura completely bataya hua hai. Pehle Aditya ji ko bataya. Aap agar discussion ho raha hai, solution karna hai to agar aap kisi senior ke sath solution expect kar rahe hain to aapko thoda sa time dena hoga taki hum aapke problem ko. Solution aapko abhi. Sir solution main de rahi hu aapko. Main aapko categories dikha rahi hu aapne dekhi nahi. Kya solution de rahe hain aap. Aap bol rahe hain ki 50,000 ka filter lagaiye aapke paas mein aaya nahi hoga. Aap kabhi active nahi honge. To koi khana khane to jayega na ma'am. Ya aise hi koi aapke samne baithe rahe hain. Sir dekhiye aap jo active hai hum unhe rok nahi sakte na. Sahi. Aap bataiye kya koi tarika hai ki hum kisi ko rok de ki aap mat purchase kariye. Aisa to nahi na kar sakte. Ab sir ye apna apna tarika hai kaun kaise handle kar raha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states direct queries not being received.

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check direct queries.

- Executive showed leads on the customer's account.

- Executive offered to show product categories.



Next Steps: 

- Customer wants a reply via email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, direct queries, filters
